bibl.title: Umm-el-Breigât (Tebtynis): 2002
bibl.note: French-Italian Mission of the IFAO and the University of Milan, September 1st-November 2nd, 2002. Work conducted in the area situated east of the temple of Soknebtynis and in the southern part of the settlement, along the dromos. - P. 109: papyri, ostraka, dipinti.
bibl.seg: French-Italian Mission of the IFAO and the University of Milan, September 1st-November 2nd, 2002. Work conducted in the area situated east of the temple of Soknebtynis and in the southern part of the settlement, along the dromos. - P. 109: papyri, ostraka, dipinti.
